H0.text: Red blood cells are the host's component that parasites infect.

H1.text: Platelets are the host's component that parasites infect.

H2.text: Plasma is the host component that parasites infect.

H3.text: White blood cells are the host's components that parasites infect.

A4.text: In the blood, the merozoites rapidly invade individual red blood cells

A5.text: The parasites multiply asexually within red blood cells, periodically breaking out to infect new ones
